title: Remote Language Learning Design Using the CAFE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized microlearning design for improving job seekers' language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can explain remote learning design procedures utilizing the four elements of the CAFE model (Content, Activities, Facilitation, Evaluation)
Learners can design 15-minute language learning micro-content for mobile environments
Learners can implement formative assessment activities using real-time feedback tools (quizzes, discussion boards)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
